leads.title: VP of Operations
leads.signal: LinkedIn post: 'Hiring ops manager to handle our scaling nightmares.' 3 job postings for manual data entry roles in 2 weeks.
leads.notes: Mid-market logistics firm, 120 employees. Growing 40% YoY but ops team is drowning. Perfect automation candidate.

leads.title: Managing Partner
leads.signal: Indeed listing: 'Office Manager — must wrangle 4 locations worth of scheduling.' Glassdoor reviews mention 'outdated systems.'
leads.notes: 4-location dental practice. Currently using paper + spreadsheets for patient flow. Revenue ~$6M.

leads.title: Founder & CEO
leads.signal: Twitter thread: 'We spend 20 hrs/week on class scheduling and instructor coordination. There has to be a better way.' 847 likes.
leads.notes: Boutique fitness chain, 8 studios. Posting about manual scheduling pain publicly — warm lead.

leads.title: COO
leads.signal: Press release: expanding from 1 to 3 locations by Q3. Job posting for 'Operations Coordinator' mentions 'building processes from scratch.'
leads.notes: Private tutoring company going multi-location. Perfect time to implement systems before scaling pain hits.

leads.title: General Manager
leads.signal: Opened intro email 3x in 24 hours. Clicked pricing page link. Visited case study for similar home services company.
leads.notes: Initial email sent Feb 14. High engagement — hasn't replied yet but clearly interested. Follow up with case study.

leads.title: Director of Operations
leads.signal: Replied to cold email: 'This is exactly what we've been looking for. Can you send more info on the restaurant-specific features?'
leads.notes: 5-location restaurant group. Replied same day. Sent detailed feature breakdown + ROI calculator. Very responsive.

leads.title: Plant Manager
leads.signal: Downloaded 3 case studies, pricing guide, and ROI whitepaper in one session. Spent 14 minutes on integration docs page.
leads.notes: 200-person manufacturing plant. Deep research mode — likely evaluating multiple vendors. Need to get a call before they shortlist.

leads.title: Managing Broker
leads.signal: Demo booked for Tuesday 2pm. Previously posted on BiggerPockets about 'agent onboarding taking forever.' 45 agents across 3 offices.
leads.notes: Real estate brokerage. Pain point is agent onboarding and transaction coordination. Demo with David + their tech lead.

leads.title: CTO
leads.signal: Referred by Nordic Coffee (existing client). Meeting with CTO and Head of Clinical Ops. They're replacing a legacy system.
leads.notes: 12-clinic health network. Budget approved for new ops platform. CTO is technical and wants API deep-dive.

leads.title: Head of Operations
leads.signal: Closed! $2,400/mo annual contract. Started as cold outreach — AI flagged their 'warehouse coordinator' job posting.
leads.notes: Specialty coffee roaster + wholesale. 3 warehouses. Signed annual contract after 2 demos. Now referring other businesses.

leads.title: Managing Partner
leads.signal: Lost to competitor — chose cheaper point solution. Pain wasn't acute enough for full platform. May revisit in 6 months.
leads.notes: 20-person accounting firm. Went with a simpler scheduling-only tool. Set reminder to re-engage in August when tax season pain returns.

leads.title: Agency Director
leads.signal: Agency blog post: 'Why we're adding ops consulting to our service offering.' 15 SMB clients who need automation.
leads.notes: Digital agency with 15 SMB clients. Looking to white-label an ops platform. Could be 10+ referrals/year.

leads.title: Principal Consultant
leads.signal: LinkedIn profile update: 'Helping small businesses scale with the right tech stack.' Connected with 3 of our existing clients.
leads.notes: Solo consultant specializing in SMB ops transformation. Strong network in local business community.

leads.title: Managing Director
leads.signal: Spoke at local chamber of commerce about 'tech adoption gaps in small business.' Posted on LinkedIn about looking for platform partners.
leads.notes: Business advisory firm. 40+ SMB clients. Actively seeking tech partnerships to complement their advisory services.

leads.title: Director of Partnerships
leads.signal: Replied to partnership email: 'We've been looking for exactly this kind of platform to recommend to our managed services clients.'
leads.notes: MSP with 50+ clients. Wants to bundle our platform with their managed IT services. High volume potential.

leads.title: Portfolio Operations Lead
leads.signal: VC firm's portfolio includes 12 early-stage companies. Posted about 'standardizing ops tooling across portfolio companies.'
leads.notes: Early-stage VC. If we become their recommended ops platform, instant access to 12+ startups. Sent partnership deck.

leads.title: Lead Coach
leads.signal: Partnership call Thursday. His coaching clients constantly ask for tool recommendations. Wants referral fee structure.
leads.notes: Business coach with 25 active clients. Partnership model: referral fee per client. Call to finalize terms.
